1421730.name: Dead Hope
1421730.description:
Dead Hope is an open world loot shooter inspired from games like 'The WarZ' and 'The Division'


There are two differente gamemodes to play

SURVIVAL MODE:
The survival mode can be played alone in single player or with friends in co-op. In this mode you will fight against the post-apocalypse, building a settlement and trying to survive against the zombies and from the nature itself.

ONLINE MODE:
In the online mode, you also try to survive against the post-apocalypse, but the biggest enemie wont be the zombies or the nature, it will be the fight for ressoruces against other survivors. The main target of the online mode is to replenish your global stock of items, so you are ready for battles against other players or for faction wars to show who is the best survival squad. With faction leagues, weekly events and much more.
1421730.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 泰语, 波兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
